lyrics.line: He's the coolest rat you'll ever see
He's got style and he's got class,
And a tail that could kick your ass
His fur is sleek, his eyes are bright,
He never backs down from a fight
He's always there when I need him most,
My brother Jeffery, he's one hell of a host
We may be rats, but we're family first,
Through thick and thin we've quenched our thirst
So here's to you, my dear brother Jeffery,
You'll always be the coolest rat to me
